alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 10:00AM EST until January 06 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun affecting Webster and McLean Counties. .Recent heavy rain will cause the Green River at Calhoun to rise above flood stage. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 23.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.2 feet on 11/24/1988. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
